channel.title: *fixed
channel.description: [code]ItemHandler.addItem(526, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);[/code] for some reason in pvp my guy doesn't drop the newly items, such as the dragon kite, so I'm going to force him to drop them in the death code area. Also it would be help full to provide the code to unequip the items too..thanks for your help :)
